name: df-redund
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wredund(c0, c1, c2), wa(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c0, c2), cin(c1, c2))))
comment: Define the redundancy predicate. Read: ` A ` is redundant with respect to ` B ` in ` C ` . For sets, binary relation on the class of all redundant sets ( ~ brredunds ) is equivalent to satisfying the redundancy predicate. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 23-Oct-2022.)
